recipesJson.name: (4x2)+4 Strawbs & cream
recipesJson.author: Kau_barros
recipesJson.description:
I don’t like to much strawberry on my cream.
Always wondered what to do with that “Cap Strawberries and cream” all forgotten, with spider webs all over its cute bottle. 

Found this cream with a hint of sweet ripe strawberry on top. Tasty. Adv. Not too sweet. 

If you are that sugary vape kinda person, add that 0.5% super sweet you have over there. 

Shake and vape certified 🎈

Hope you enjoy!
Lots of love and flavor <3
